MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Oakhill Drive and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because further work is required to allow our engineers to attach the remaining generators to the network in order to restore supplies. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.19PM on 9th March 2021.
